comment._content: this image from SNHB was the starting point to the gallery ("name tells you all"). weeks later this gallery was continued with images of LoC. here: People and boats 2 and here: People and boats 3 Probably, just the color ones in P&B 3 had been included in the first gallery, if flickr allowed to include more than 18 images
